ComicInfo.Summary:
While Conan's team is busy trying to take treasure from a dragon, Kulan Gath's forces are poisoning the world's drug supply to summon Shuma Gorath. Black Widow, Wolverine and Son of Satan take on the Priest of Sickles. Ain't no party like a Savage party, and you can't throw a poison drug caper without the Punisher crashing it.
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|---------------|-----------------------------------------------------------|------------------| | Reg | Regular Cover | Valerio Giangiordano & Frank D'Armata | 1 | | Var | Variant Cover | Alexander Lozano, Wade von Grawbadger & Espen Grundetjern | 2 |
ComicInfo.Title: Chapter Fifteen: Defrocked
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Alexander Lozano,Espen Grundetjern,Frank D'Armata,Valerio Giangiordano,Wade von Grawbadger
